heroDescription: Optimize ads and increase sales on eBay, Vinted, and other platforms with the power of AI
productDetails: Create the perfect description for your listings
featuresDescription: With Descrify, you’re just a few clicks away from the perfect product description. Our AI analyzes your item’s details and crafts descriptions designed to sell. No more writing stress - spend your time where it counts
pricesDescription: Choose a subscription plan that suits your needs. Our Free plan is great to test the service, while our Standard and Premium plans offer advanced features for serious sellers.
faqsDescription: We’ve got answers. Discover how Descrify can change the way you sell online.
footerCaption: The smarter way to sell. Harness the power of AI for listings that stand out and sell fast.
modalSettingCaption1: Select the language of the platform
cookieBannerText: We use third-party cookies to personalize services and analyze traffic on the platform. For further information, read:
messageBannerTitle: Congratulations, you have become part of Describify!
messageBannerContent: As soon as we are ready with the Beta version launch, we will send you a notification email.
waitlistBannerContent: Join the Describify community today and receive an exclusive bonus of 5 tokens on your first access!
